analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BitGuildMarketplace._buy (/unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol#783-825):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(gameToken.ownerOf(_tokenId) == address(this),Item is not available.) (/unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol#800-802)
	- require(bool,string)(PLAT.transferFrom(_buyer,address(this),_price),PLAT payment transfer failed.) (/unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol#806-808)
	- gameToken.safeTransferFrom(this,_buyer,_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol#809-811)
	- (None,fee) = getFee(_price,currencyAddress,_buyer,seller,_token) (/unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol#811-814)
	- PLAT.transfer(seller,_price - fee) (/unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol#817)
	External calls sending eth:
	- require(bool,string)(seller.send(_price - fee) == true,Transfer to seller failed.) (/unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol#818-822)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- listings (/unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol#824-825)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(seller.send(_price - fee) == true,Transfer to seller failed.)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol:
	Contract BitGuildWhitelist has payable functions:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x00e2c3b903bec1131fb05283c92df8a94613ca4a.sol:
	Contract BitGuildFeeProvider has payable functions:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
